title: Endings Guide
content:
obtained by making the decision of commanding the Netherbrain to destroy itself while you're atop it as you resist its temptations to join The Absolute. This will successfully destroy the Netherbrain and the tadpoles under its command, and the fighting below in the city will cease. The people of different races will rejoice as they are freed from the grips and terror of the Illithid Empire.

The Emperor will command the Netherbrain to destroy the tadpoles, and then itself.
